sections.heading: of cattle; contracts allowed; conditions
sections.text: Section 54-2617 does not apply to any contract to purchase cattle for slaughter if the following conditions are met:(1) The contract to purchase cattle for slaughter specifies the month of delivery and allows the seller to set the week for delivery within suc
